MRN_SYN_3_style_2: PROCEDURE: EBUS-TBNA. The patient presented with mediastinal lymphadenopathy. Ultrasound survey visualized enlarged nodes at stations 4R, 7, and 10R. Transbronchial needle aspiration was performed at 5 stations (4R, 4L, 7, 10R, 11R). Cytopathology revealed non-necrotizing granulomas with no evidence of malignancy, consistent with sarcoidosis.
